attrs: Bonus +15% Lifesteal +8% Spell lifesteal +250 Night vision
info: Night vision bonus from multiple Vampire Fangs fully stacks.
Spell lifesteal heals for 1.6% from damage dealt to non-hero units.
Lifesteal from multiple Vampire Fangs fully stacks.
Spell lifesteal from multiple Vampire Fangs does not stack.
Stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal and spell lifesteal.
